config_manager.title: Manage modpacks config
config_manager.warning.game_restart: You will need to restart your game
config_manager.warning.lose_some_config: §eSome of your settings will be replaced with the modpack's defaults.§l Your current configs may be partially overwritten§r
config_manager.warning.lose_all_config: §c§lAll of your current configs will be deleted and replaced entirely with the modpack's defaults§r
